data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hosen, Md. Iqbal, Li, Tai-Hui, Lodge, Deborah Jean, Rockefeller, Alan (2016): The first ITS phylogeny of the genus Cantharocybe (Agaricales, Hygrophoraceae) with a new record of C. virosa from Bangladesh. MycoKeys 14: 37-50, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.14.9859, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.14.9859
